Daily Bite #15

Deden Fathurahman — November 21, 2017
less than 1 minute read (93 words)

  • Entering the Quantum Era—How Firefox got fast again and where it’s going to get faster – I’ve been reviewing the Firefox Quantum earlier, this is a much more fun way to ilustrate the new technologies behind new Firefox.

  • New research: Understanding the root cause of account takeover – The paper published here by Google Research Paper, the paper showed the breach from various site, and also how it was sold in black market, motherboard wrote a how to not get hacked guide.
